Translations.Text: Ha yi, mi mu
A ni, xi ni, ga fu
Wanneng de, zhi rui de an la, zheyang qishi ni he ni yiqian de zhong xianzhi
Tiandi wanwu dou shi ta de; ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi da de
Zhu tianti jihu cong shangmian polie, zhong tianshi zansong tamen de zhu, bing wei dimian shang de ren qiurao. Zhen de, an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
She an la er ze qu baohu zhe de ren, an la shi jianshi tamen de, ni jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe

Wo zheyang qishi ni yi ben alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian ni jinggao shou yi ji qi sizhou de jumin, yibian ni yugao hao wuyi yi de jihe ri. Yibufen ren jiang zai leyuan zhong, yibufen ren jiang zai liehuo zhong
Jiaruo an la yiyu, ta bi shi tamen xinfeng tongyi zongjiao, dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe ru yu ta de enhui zhong; bu yi de renmen, jue wu baohu zhe, ye wu yuanzhu zhe
Tamen zenme she ta er ze qu bie de baohu zhe ne? An la cai shi baohu zhe, ta neng shi sizhe fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Wulun nimen zhenglun shenme shi, dou yao gui an la panjue. Na shi an la, shi wo de zhu, wo zhi tuo kao ta, wo zhi guiyi ta

Ta shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, ta yi nimen de tonglei wei nimen de qizi; shi nimen de shengchu tonglei xiangpei; ta jie ci shi nimen fanzhi. Renhe wu dou bushi xiang ta. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Tiandi de baozang, zhishi ta de; ta yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo; ta shi quanzhi wanwu de

Ta yi wei nimen zhiding zhengjiao, jiushi tasuo mingling nu ha de, tasuo qishi ni de, ta mingling yi bo la xin, mu sa he er sa de zongjiao. Nimen yingdang jin shouzhengjiao, buyao wei zhengjiao er fen men bie hu. Yi wu pei zhu de renmen, yiwei ni suo jiaodao tamen de shi shi nankan di. An la jiang tasuo yiyu zhe zhaozhi yu zheng jiao, jiang guiyi ta zhe yindao yu zhenli

Zhishi lailin tamen zhihou, tamen cai wei huxiang jidu er fen paibie. Jiaruo bu shi yinwei ni de zhu yi yuxian shuoguo yao yanqi chengzhi, name, tamen bi yi shou caipanle. Zai tamen zhihou jicheng tian jing de renmen, duiyu tian jing, dique zai shi ren youyu de yihuo zhong

Ni yingdang zhao ren yu ci dao, ni yingdang jin zun tianming, chang shou zhengdao, buyao shuncong tamen de siyu. Ni shuo:“Wo quexin an la suo jiang shi de jingdian, wo fengming gongping daiyu nimen. An la shi women de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu. Women you women de gongzuo, nimen you nimen de gongzuo, women bubi he nimen bianbo. An la jiang jihe women, ta shi weiyi de guisu.”
Zhongren ji ying zhao er xinfeng an la de zongjiao hou, wei ta er bianbo zhe, ju tamen de zhu kan lai, tamen de zhengju shi wuxiao de, tamen yingdang zao qian nu, bing shou yanxing
An la jiang shi baohan zhenli de jingdian, bing jiang shi gongping. Ni zenme neng zhidao ne? Fuhuo shi huoxu shi linjin de

Buxin fuhuo shi de renmen yaoqiu ta zaori shixian; er quexin ta de renmen que pa ta zaori shixian, bingqie zhidao ta shi zhenshi de. Zhen de, wei fuhuo shi'er zhengbian de renmen, dique zai bu jin qingli de mi wu zhi zhong
An la shi ci'ai ta de zhong pu de, ta gongji tasuo yiyu gongji de ren, ta que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de
Shei yu de houshi de shouhuo, wo jiu jia zeng shei de shouhuo; shei yu de jinshi de shouhuo, wo jiu gei shei yidian jinshi de shouhuo; ta zai houshi, meiyou fen er
Nandao tamen you xuduo pei zhu, ceng wei tamen zhiding an la suo wei xuke de zongjiao ma? Jiaruo meiyou na pan ci, tamen bi shou panjue, bu yi de renmen, bi shou tongku de xingfa

Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi de renmen wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er kongju, naxie zui'e de chengfa biding lailin tamen. Xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jianglai yao juzhu zai leyuan de shengdi zhong, zai tamen de zhu nali, tamen de xiangshou tamen suo yu xiangshou de; na que shi hong en

Na shi an la yong lai xiang ta naxie xindao erqie xingshan de pu renmen baoxi de. Ni shuo:“Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu baochou, dan qiu wei tongzu er qin'ai.” Shei xing yi jian shanshi, wo yao jiabei di baochou shei. An la que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de
Buran, tamen shuo:“Ta jiajie an la de mingyi er niezao.” Ruguo an la yiyu, ta jiu fengbi ni de xin. An la yi qi wenci mosha xuwei, zhengshi zhenli, ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de
Ta zhunxu ta de zhong pu huiguo, ta raoshu yiqie zui'e, ta zhidao nimen de xingwei
Ta daying xindao erqie xingshan zhe de qidao, ta yi endian jia ci tamen. Bu xindao zhe jiang shou yanli de xingfa

Ruguo an la shi ta de pu renmen de xiangshou kuanyu de jiyang, tamen bi zai da dishang zuo'e; dan ta yi dingliang er jiangxia tasuo yu jiang de jiyang. Ta duiyu ta de pu renmen, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Ta zai tamen juewang zhihou, jiangxia shi yu, guang shile ta de enhui, ta que shi baohu zhe, que shi ke song de
Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi chuangzao tiandi he ta zai tiandi jian suo sanbu de ge zhong dongwu, ta neng ziyou de jiang tamen jihe zai yiqi
Fan nimen suo zaoyu de zainan, dou shi youyu nimen suozuo de zui'e; ta raoshu nimen de xuduo zuiguo
Nimen zai da dishang jue buneng taobi tianqian, chu an la wai, nimen meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe
Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi zai haizhong xiang shanyue yiban de chuanbo
Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiu shi feng jingzhi, er chuanbo tingdun zai haimian shang. Duiyu mei ge jianren zhe, ganxie zhe, qizhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ta huo yin tamen suozuo de zui'e, er shi naxie chuanbo chenmo; ta raoshu xuduo ren de zuiguo
Wei wo de jixiang er zhenglun de renmen, zhidao tamen ziji jue wu chu tao zui
Fan nimen suo shou ci de, wulun shenme, dou shi jinshi shenghuo de xiangshou. Zai an la nali de baochou, shi geng youmei de, shi geng changjiu de, na shi guiyu xindao er zhi tuo kao an la zhe
ye guiyu yuanli dazui he choushi, qie zai fanu shi neng she you zhe
Ye guiyu yingda zhu de haozhao, qie jin shou bai gong zhe; tamen de shiwu, shi you xieshang er jueding de, tamen fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de
ye guiyu neng fankang ziji suo zaoyu de qinhai zhe
E xing ying de tongyang de e bao. Shei yuan raoshu erqie hejie, an la bi baochou shei. An la que shi bu xi'ai bu yi zhe de
Shou ren qiwu er jinxing baofu de renmen, shi wu ke zebei de
Ying shou zebei de, shi qiwu taren, bingqie zai difang shang manheng wuli zhe; zhexie ren jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Fan neng renshou er jiayi she you zhe, tamen di na zhong xingwei, que shi yinggai juexin zuo de shiqing
An la shi shei mi wu, zai an la de qi juehou, shei meiyou renhe baohu zhe. Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi zhe yanjian xingfa shi shuo:“Hai you fanhui (chenshi) de tujing ma?”

Ni jianglai yao kanjian tamen shen lin huo yu, yin beijian er gongjing, anzhong tou kan. Xindao zhe jiang shuo:“Kui she de renmen, zai fuhuo ri que shi sangshi zishen he jiashu de.” Zhen de, bu yi zhe bi zai yongheng de xingfa zhong
Chu an la wai, tamen jiang meiyou renhe pengyou yuanzhu tamen. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou daolu
Zai buke kangju zhi ri, cong an la jianglin yiqian, nimen yingdang daying nimen de zhu. Zai na ri nimen jue meiyou taobi di difang, ye jue buneng dilai

Ruguo tamen tuibi, name, wo meiyou pai ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe, ni zhi fu tongzhi de zeren. Wo shi renlei changshi cong wo fachu de enhui de shihou, tamen yin enhui er kuaile; tamen yinwei cengjing fanzui er zaonan de shihou, renlei que shi gu en de
Tiandi de zhuquan, gui an la suoyou. Ta yu chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme; yu gei shei nuhai, jiu gei shei nuhai; yu gei shei nanhai, jiu gei shei nanhai
huo shi tamen jian sheng nanhai he nuhai; ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe chengwei buneng shengyu de. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de
Renhe ren ye bupei yu an la duihua, chufei qishi, huo cong weimu de houmian, huo pai yige shizhe, feng ta de mingling er qishi tasuo yu qishi de. Ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi rui de

Wo zheyang qishi ni cong wo de mingling zhong fachu de jingshen. Ni benlai bu zhidao tian jing shi shenme, zhengxin shi shenme; dan wo yi tian jing wei guangming, er jie ci guangming yindao wo suo yu yindao de puren. Ni que shi zhishi zhenglu zhe
Na shi an la de lu. Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Zhen de, wanshi zhi gui an la
